trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Strings" name="Strings" href=""></xref> module contains procedures used to perform string operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Strings" name="Strings" href=""> </xref>模組包含用來執行字串作業的程序。

trans-unit.source: This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and run-time library members that manipulate strings.
trans-unit.target: 這個模組支援的 Visual Basic 語言關鍵字和操作字串的執行階段程式庫成員。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> value representing the character code corresponding to a character.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>值，表示為字元的對應字元碼。

trans-unit.source: `Asc` returns the *code point*, or character code, for the input character.
trans-unit.target: `Asc`傳回*程式碼點*，或輸入字元的字元碼。

trans-unit.source: This can be 0 through 255 for single-byte character set (SBCS) values and -32768 through 32767 for double-byte character set (DBCS) values.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是 0 到 255 的單一位元組字元集 (sbcs) 的值介於-32768 至 32767 之間的雙位元組字元集 (dbcs) 的值。

trans-unit.source: `AscW` returns the Unicode code point for the input character.
trans-unit.target: `AscW`傳回輸入字元的 Unicode 字碼指標。

trans-unit.source: This can be 0 through 65535.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是 0 到 65535。

trans-unit.source: The returned value is independent of the culture and code page settings for the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的值與目前執行緒的文化特性和字碼頁設定無關。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `AscB` function of earlier versions of Visual Basic returns a code for a byte, rather than a character.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`AscB`較舊版本的 Visual Basic 的函式傳回一個位元組，而不是一個字元的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications.
trans-unit.target: 它是主要用來轉換雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串。

trans-unit.source: All Visual Basic 2005 strings are in Unicode, and `AscB` is no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: 所有的 Visual Basic 2005 字串都位於 Unicode，和`AscB`不再支援。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: Any valid <xref uid="langword_csharp_Char" name="Char" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> expression.
trans-unit.target: 任何有效<xref uid="langword_csharp_Char" name="Char" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>運算式。

trans-unit.source: If `String` is a <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> expression, only the first character of the string is used for input.
trans-unit.target: 如果`String`是<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>運算式，字串的第一個字元用於輸入。

trans-unit.source: If `String` is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> or contains no characters, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果`String`是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>或未包含任何字元，<xref:System.ArgumentException>就會發生錯誤。</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>值，表示為字元的對應字元碼。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> value representing the character code corresponding to a character.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>值，表示為字元的對應字元碼。

trans-unit.source: Returns the character associated with the specified character code.
trans-unit.target: 傳回與指定的字元碼相關聯的字元。

trans-unit.source: The asymmetric range accepted for `CharCode` compensates for the storage differences between the `Short` and the `Integer`.
trans-unit.target: 非對稱式範圍接受`CharCode`補償儲存體之間的差異`Short`和`Integer`。

trans-unit.source: For example, -29183 is a `Short` but +36353 is an `Integer`.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，是-29183`Short`但 +36353 `Integer`。

trans-unit.source: This also facilitates compatibility with Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: 這也有助於與 Visual Basic 6.0 的相容性。

trans-unit.source: `Chr` uses the <xref:System.Text.Encoding> class in the <xref:System.Text?displayProperty=fullName> namespace to determine if the current thread is using a single-byte character set (SBCS) or a double-byte character set (DBCS).
trans-unit.target: `Chr`使用<xref:System.Text.Encoding>類別<xref:System.Text?displayProperty=fullName>命名空間，以判斷目前的執行緒是否使用單一位元組字元集 (SBCS) 或雙位元組字集 (DBCS)。</xref:System.Text?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: It then takes `CharCode` as a code point in the appropriate set.
trans-unit.target: 接著會`CharCode`為碼指向適當的集合中。

trans-unit.source: The range can be 0 through 255 for SBCS characters and -32768 through 65535 for DBCS characters.
trans-unit.target: 範圍可以是 0 到 255 的 SBCS 字元-32768 到 65535 DBCS 字元。

trans-unit.source: The returned value depends on the code page for the current thread, which is contained in the <xref:System.Globalization.TextInfo.ANSICodePage%2A> property of the <xref:System.Globalization.TextInfo> class in the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的值取決於目前的執行緒，包含此程式碼頁<xref:System.Globalization.TextInfo.ANSICodePage%2A>屬性<xref:System.Globalization.TextInfo>類別<xref:System.Globalization>命名空間。</xref:System.Globalization> </xref:System.Globalization.TextInfo> </xref:System.Globalization.TextInfo.ANSICodePage%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can obtain <xref:System.Globalization.TextInfo.ANSICodePage%2A> by specifying `System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.TextInfo.ANSICodePage`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得<xref:System.Globalization.TextInfo.ANSICodePage%2A>藉由指定`System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.TextInfo.ANSICodePage`。</xref:System.Globalization.TextInfo.ANSICodePage%2A>

trans-unit.source: `ChrW` takes `CharCode` as a Unicode code point.
trans-unit.target: `ChrW`會採用`CharCode`為 Unicode 程式碼的點。

trans-unit.source: The range is independent of the culture and code page settings for the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 範圍是與目前執行緒的文化特性和字碼頁設定無關。

trans-unit.source: Values from -32768 through -1 are treated the same as values in the range +32768 through +65535.
trans-unit.target: 從-32768 到-1 的值會視為相同&32768; 到 +&65535; 的範圍中的值。

trans-unit.source: Numbers from 0 through 31 are the same as standard nonprintable ASCII codes.
trans-unit.target: 從 0 到 31 的數字是與標準無法列印的 ASCII 碼相同。

trans-unit.source: For example, `Chr(10)` returns a line feed character.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`Chr(10)`傳回換行字元。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `ChrB` function in earlier versions of Visual Basic returns a single byte.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`ChrB`在舊版的 Visual Basic 中的函式會傳回單一位元組。

trans-unit.source: It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications.
trans-unit.target: 它是主要用來轉換雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串。

trans-unit.source: All strings in Visual Basic and the .NET Framework are in Unicode, and `ChrB` is no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 和.NET Framework 中的所有字串都都位於 Unicode，和`ChrB`不再支援。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: CharCode < -32768 or > 65535 for .

trans-unit.source: Returns a zero-based array containing a subset of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> array based on specified filter criteria.
trans-unit.target: 傳回以零為起始的陣列，包含子集<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>陣列根據指定的篩選準則。

trans-unit.source: If no matches of `Match` are found within `Source`, the `Filter` function returns an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有相符的`Match`內找到`Source`、`Filter`函式會傳回空陣列。

trans-unit.source: An error occurs if `Source` is set to `Nothing` or is not a one-dimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生錯誤`Source`設`Nothing`或不是一維陣列。

trans-unit.source: The array returned by the `Filter` function contains only enough elements to contain the number of matched items.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的陣列`Filter`函式僅包含足夠項目包含相符的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The `Compare` argument can have the following values.
trans-unit.target: `Compare`引數可以是下列值。

trans-unit.source: ||| |-|-| |Constant|Description| |`CompareMethod.Binary`|Performs a binary comparison| |`CompareMethod.Text`|Performs a textual comparison|
trans-unit.target: ||| |-|-| |常數 |描述 | |`CompareMethod.Binary`|執行二進位比較 | |`CompareMethod.Text`|執行文字比較 |

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: One-dimensional array of strings to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的字串一維陣列。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: String to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的字串。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether to return substrings that include or exclude `Match`.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>值，指出是否傳回子字串，包含或排除`Match`。

trans-unit.source: If `Include` is <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>, the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Filter" name="Filter" href=""></xref> function returns the subset of the array that contains `Match` as a substring.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Include`是<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""> </xref>、 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Filter" name="Filter" href=""> </xref>函式會傳回陣列，其中包含子集`Match`子字串。

trans-unit.source: If `Include` is <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>, the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Filter" name="Filter" href=""></xref> function returns the subset of the array that does not contain `Match` as a substring.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Include`是<xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""> </xref>、 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Filter" name="Filter" href=""> </xref>函式會傳回陣列，其中不包含子集`Match`子字串。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: Numeric value indicating the kind of string comparison to use.
trans-unit.target: 數字的值，表示要使用的字串比較的類型。

trans-unit.source: See "Settings" for values.
trans-unit.target: 值，請參閱 < 設定 >。

trans-unit.source: Returns a zero-based array containing a subset of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> array based on specified filter criteria.

trans-unit.target: 有效的具名或使用者定義格式<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>運算式。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string formatted according to instructions contained in a format <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> expression.
trans-unit.target: 傳回根據格式中所包含的指示格式化字串<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>運算式。

trans-unit.source: Returns an expression formatted as a currency value using the currency symbol defined in the system control panel.
trans-unit.target: 傳回格式化為使用系統控制台 中定義的貨幣符號的貨幣值的運算式。

trans-unit.source: When one or more optional arguments are omitted, the computer's matching regional-settings values are used instead.
trans-unit.target: 當省略選擇性的一個或多個引數時，會改用電腦相符的地區設定值。

trans-unit.source: The position of the currency symbol relative to the currency value is determined by the system's regional settings.
trans-unit.target: 相對於貨幣值的貨幣符號的位置取決於系統的地區設定。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > All settings information comes from the locale of the application.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 所有設定資訊是都來自應用程式的地區設定。

trans-unit.source: By default, that will be the locale set in the control panel.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這會是在控制台中設定的地區設定。

trans-unit.source: However, it may be changed programmatically by using the .NET Framework, except leading zero, which comes from the `Number` tab.
trans-unit.target: 不過，它可能會變更以程式設計方式使用.NET Framework 中，但前置零，來自`Number` 索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: The `IncludeLeadingDigit`, `UseParensForNegativeNumbers`, and `GroupDigits` arguments take the following TriState enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: `IncludeLeadingDigit`， `UseParensForNegativeNumbers`，和`GroupDigits`引數接受下列 Tri-state 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: ||| |-|-| |Value|Description| |`TriState.True`|True| |`TriState.False`|False| |`TriState.UseDefault`|The computer's regional settings|
trans-unit.target: ||| |-|-| |值 |描述 | |`TriState.True`|True | |`TriState.False`|False | |`TriState.UseDefault`|電腦的地區設定 |

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: Expression to be formatted.
trans-unit.target: 要格式化的運算式。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: Numeric value indicating how many places are displayed to the right of the decimal.
trans-unit.target: 指出顯示右邊的小數位數數字的值。

trans-unit.source: Default value is –1, which indicates that the computer's regional settings are used.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 –&1;，表示將使用電腦的地區設定。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.TriState"></xref> enumeration that indicates whether or not a leading zero is displayed for fractional values.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.TriState"></xref>指出顯示小數值的前置零的列舉。

trans-unit.source: See "Remarks" for values.
trans-unit.target: 值，請參閱 < 備註 >。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.TriState"></xref> enumeration that indicates whether or not to place negative values within parentheses.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.TriState"></xref>列舉，指出要將放在括號內的負數值。

trans-unit.source: See "Remarks" for values.
trans-unit.target: 值，請參閱 < 備註 >。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.TriState"></xref>列舉，指出將數字分組使用電腦的地區設定中指定的群組分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: See "Remarks" for values.
trans-unit.target: 值，請參閱 < 備註 >。

trans-unit.source: Returns an expression formatted as a currency value using the currency symbol defined in the system control panel.
trans-unit.target: 傳回格式化為使用系統控制台 中定義的貨幣符號的貨幣值的運算式。

trans-unit.source: Number of digits after decimal point is greater than 99.
trans-unit.target: 小數點後數字的數目大於 99。

trans-unit.source: Type is not numeric.
trans-unit.target: 類型不是數字。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string expression representing a date/time value.
trans-unit.target: 傳回代表日期/時間值的字串運算式。

trans-unit.source: The `Date` data type always contains both date and time information.
trans-unit.target: `Date`資料類型一定會包含日期和時間資訊。

trans-unit.source: For purposes of type conversion, Visual Basic considers 1/1/1 (January 1 of the year 1) to be a neutral value for the date, and 00:00:00 (midnight) to be a neutral value for the time.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 型別轉換的目的，請考慮 1/1/1 (1 年的 1 年) 是中性值的日期和 00:00:00 （午夜） 是中性值的時間。

trans-unit.source: If you format a `Date` value as a date/time string, `FormatDateTime` does not include neutral values in the resulting string.
trans-unit.target: 如果您格式化`Date`值為日期/時間字串，`FormatDateTime`中產生的字串不包含中性的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you convert #1/1/0001 9:30:00# to a string, the result is "9:30:00 AM"; the date information is suppressed.
However, the date information is still present in the original `Date` value and can be recovered with functions such as `DatePart`.
trans-unit.target: 不過，將日期資訊是仍會出現在原始`Date`值，並可以復原與函式例如`DatePart`。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you pass the `Expression` argument as a `String` literal, `FormatDateTime` interprets it according to the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A> setting of your application.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果您要傳入`Expression`引數做`String`常值，`FormatDateTime`會解譯根據<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A>應用程式的設定。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if you pass it as a `Date` literal, use the format #mm/dd/yyyy#, because `FormatDateTime` always interprets a `Date` literal according to the English (US) culture.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您將它傳遞為`Date`常值中，使用格式 #mm/dd/yyyy # 因為`FormatDateTime`一律解譯`Date`根據英文 （美國） 文化特性的常值。

trans-unit.source: This is necessary because, if an application is developed and coded using `Date` literals from one culture, but is then executed on a platform with a different culture, the `Date` literals could be parsed incorrectly.
trans-unit.target: 這是必要的因為如果應用程式開發時，並使用自動程式化`Date`常值，從某個文化特性，但有不同的文化特性的平台上執行`Date`常值可能不正確剖析。

trans-unit.source: The `NamedFormat` argument has the following settings.
trans-unit.target: `NamedFormat`引數必須具有下列設定。

trans-unit.source: ||| |-|-| |Constant|Description| |`DateFormat.GeneralDate`|Display a date and/or time.
trans-unit.target: ||| |-|-| |常數 |描述 | |`DateFormat.GeneralDate`|顯示日期和/或時間。

trans-unit.source: Display a date part as a short date.
trans-unit.target: 顯示簡短日期的日期部分。

trans-unit.source: If there is a time part, display it as a long time.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有時間部分，請將它顯示成很長的時間。

trans-unit.source: If present, both parts display.| |`DateFormat.LongDate`|Display a date using the long date format specified in your computer's regional settings.| |`DateFormat.ShortDate`|Display a date using the short date format specified in your computer's regional settings.| |`DateFormat.LongTime`|Display a time using the time format specified in your computer's regional settings.| |`DateFormat.ShortTime`|Display a time using the 24-hour format (hh:mm).|
trans-unit.target: 如果有的話，這兩個組件會顯示。 | |`DateFormat.LongDate`|使用電腦的地區設定中指定的完整日期格式顯示日期。 | |`DateFormat.ShortDate`|使用您電腦的地區設定中指定的簡短日期格式顯示日期。 | |`DateFormat.LongTime`|使用您電腦的地區設定中指定的時間格式顯示時間。 | |`DateFormat.ShortTime`|顯示時間使用 24 小時制格式 (hh: mm)。 |

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Date" name="Date" href=""></xref> expression to be formatted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Date" name="Date" href=""></xref>要格式化的運算式。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: Numeric value that indicates the date/time format used.
trans-unit.target: 數字的值，表示日期/時間格式使用。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, <xref uid="langword_csharp_DateFormat.GeneralDate" name="DateFormat.GeneralDate" href=""></xref> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略， <xref uid="langword_csharp_DateFormat.GeneralDate" name="DateFormat.GeneralDate" href=""> </xref>用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string expression representing a date/time value.
trans-unit.target: 傳回代表日期/時間值的字串運算式。

trans-unit.source: NamedFormat setting is not valid.
trans-unit.target: NamedFormat設定不正確。

trans-unit.source: All Visual Basic 2005 strings are in Unicode, and `InStrB` is no longer supported.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string created by joining a number of substrings contained in an array.
trans-unit.target: 傳回建立聯結的子字串陣列中包含的數字的字串。

trans-unit.source: There is a parity between the `Join` and `Split` functions.
trans-unit.target: 是對等之間`Join`和`Split`函式。

trans-unit.source: The `Join` function takes an array of strings and joins them using a delimiter string, to return a single string.
trans-unit.target: `Join`函式接受字串陣列，並結合使用分隔符號字串，以傳回單一字串。

trans-unit.source: The `Split` function takes a string and separates it at the delimiter, to return an array of strings.
trans-unit.target: `Split`函式接受字串，並分隔在分隔符號，以傳回字串陣列。

trans-unit.source: However, a key difference is that `Join` can concatenate strings with any delimiter string, `Split` can only separate strings using a single character delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 不過，主要差異在於`Join`可以串連字串使用任何分隔符號字串，`Split`只可以分開使用單一字元分隔符號的字串。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: One-dimensional array containing substrings to be joined.
trans-unit.target: 一維陣列，包含要聯結的子字串。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: Any string, used to separate the substrings in the returned string.
trans-unit.target: 任何用來分隔傳回字串中的子字串。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, the space character (" ") is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，空格字元 ("") 會使用。

trans-unit.source: If `Delimiter` is a zero-length string ("") or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>, all items in the list are concatenated with no delimiters.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Delimiter`為零長度字串 ("") 或<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>，清單中的所有項目串連而不使用分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string created by joining a number of substrings contained in an array.
trans-unit.target: 傳回建立聯結的子字串陣列中包含的數字的字串。

trans-unit.source: SourceArray is not one dimensional.
trans-unit.target: SourceArray不是其中一個維度。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string or character converted to lowercase.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串或字元轉換成小寫。

trans-unit.source: Only uppercase letters are converted to lowercase; all lowercase letters and nonletter characters remain unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只有大寫的字母會轉換成小寫。所有小寫字母和 nonletter 字元都保持不變。

trans-unit.source: This function uses the application's culture information when manipulating the string so that the case changes are appropriate for the locale in which the application is being used.
trans-unit.target: 管理字串，以便適當地區設定中使用應用程式的大小寫的變更時，此函數會使用應用程式的文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If your application makes security decisions based on the result of a comparison or case-change operation, then the operation should use the <xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, and pass <xref:System.StringComparison> or <xref:System.StringComparison> for the `comparisonType` argument.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您的應用程式進行比較或大小寫變更作業的結果為基礎的安全性決策，則此作業，應該使用<xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，然後傳遞<xref:System.StringComparison>或<xref:System.StringComparison>如`comparisonType`引數。</xref:System.StringComparison> </xref:System.StringComparison> </xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How Culture Affects Strings in Visual Basic](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何文化特性會影響字串在 Visual Basic 中](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing a specified number of characters from the left side of a string.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，包含指定的從左邊的字串的字元數。

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of characters in `str`, use the `Len` function.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷中的字元數`str`，使用`Len`函式。

trans-unit.source: If used in a Windows Forms application, or any other class that has a `Left` property, you must fully qualify the function with `Microsoft.VisualBasic.Left`.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 Windows Forms 應用程式或有任何其他類別中使用`Left`屬性，您必須完整限定的函式與`Microsoft.VisualBasic.Left`。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `LeftB` function in previous versions of Visual Basic returns a string in bytes rather than characters.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`LeftB`函式在舊版的 Visual Basic 中的位元組，而不是字元傳回的字串。

trans-unit.source: It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications.
trans-unit.target: 它是主要用來轉換雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串。

trans-unit.source: All current Visual Basic strings are in Unicode, and `LeftB` is no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: 所有目前的 Visual Basic 字串都位於 Unicode，和`LeftB`不再支援。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> expression from which the leftmost characters are returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>要從中傳回最左邊的字元運算式。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> expression.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>運算式。

trans-unit.source: Numeric expression indicating how many characters to return.
trans-unit.target: 表示要傳回多少字元的數值運算式。

trans-unit.source: If 0, a zero-length string ("") is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 0，零長度字串 ("") 會傳回。

trans-unit.source: If greater than or equal to the number of characters in `str`, the entire string is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果大於或等於中的字元數`str`，會傳回整個字串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing a specified number of characters from the left side of a string.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，包含指定的從左邊的字串的字元數。

trans-unit.source: Length < 0.
trans-unit.target: Length < 0.

trans-unit.source: Returns an integer containing either the number of characters in a string or the nominal number of bytes required to store a variable.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含在字串中的字元數或名義儲存變數所需的位元組數目的整數。

trans-unit.source: With user-defined types and `Object` variables, the `Len` function returns the size as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function.
trans-unit.target: 與使用者定義型別和`Object`變數`Len`函式傳回的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案`FilePut`函式。

trans-unit.source: If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the string.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回字串的長度。

trans-unit.source: If an `Object` contains any other type, it will return the size of the object as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Object`包含任何其他類型，它會傳回物件的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案`FilePut`函式。

trans-unit.source: The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in objects to indicate the size of the string, in bytes, when written to disk.
trans-unit.target: `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至物件，表示字串，以位元組為單位的大小，寫入時的 string 欄位至磁碟。

trans-unit.source: The `Len` function uses the `VBFixedString` attribute, if available, when determining the size of `Object` variables.
trans-unit.target: `Len`函式使用`VBFixedString`屬性，如果有的話，當決定的大小`Object`變數。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `Len` function may not be able to determine the actual number of storage bytes required when used with variable-length strings in user-defined data types.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`Len`函式可能無法判斷實際儲存可變長度的字串中的使用者定義資料型別搭配使用時所需的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `LenB` function in earlier versions of Visual Basic returns the number of bytes in a string rather than characters.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`LenB`函式在舊版的 Visual Basic 中為字串，而不是字元傳回的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications.
trans-unit.target: 它是主要用來轉換雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串。

trans-unit.source: All current Visual Basic strings are in Unicode, and `LenB` is no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: 所有目前的 Visual Basic 字串都位於 Unicode，和`LenB`不再支援。

trans-unit.source: Smart Device Developer Notes The `Len` function accepts only `String` and `Object` variables as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 智慧型裝置開發人員注意事項`Len`函式只接受`String`和`Object`做為參數的變數。

trans-unit.source: If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the `String`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回長度`String`。

trans-unit.source: If a parameter is a NULL `Object` reference, the function returns zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果參數是 NULL`Object`參考，此函數會傳回零。

trans-unit.source: If an `Object` contains any other type, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Object`包含任何其他型別，擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Any valid <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> expression or variable name.
trans-unit.target: 任何有效<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>運算式或變數名稱。

trans-unit.source: If `Expression` is of type <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref>, the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Len" name="Len" href=""></xref> function returns the size as it will be written to the file by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_FilePut" name="FilePut" href=""></xref> function.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Expression`的型別<xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""> </xref>、 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Len" name="Len" href=""> </xref>函式傳回的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案<xref uid="langword_csharp_FilePut" name="FilePut" href=""></xref>函式。

trans-unit.source: Returns an integer containing either the number of characters in a string or the nominal number of bytes required to store a variable.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含在字串中的字元數或名義儲存變數所需的位元組數目的整數。

trans-unit.target: 如果`Object`包含任何其他型別，擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Any valid <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> expression or variable name.
trans-unit.target: 任何有效<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>運算式或變數名稱。

trans-unit.source: If `Expression` is of type <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref>, the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Len" name="Len" href=""></xref> function returns the size as it will be written to the file by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_FilePut" name="FilePut" href=""></xref> function.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Expression`的型別<xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""> </xref>、 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Len" name="Len" href=""> </xref>函式傳回的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案<xref uid="langword_csharp_FilePut" name="FilePut" href=""></xref>函式。

trans-unit.source: Returns an integer containing either the number of characters in a string or the nominal number of bytes required to store a variable.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含在字串中的字元數或名義儲存變數所需的位元組數目的整數。

trans-unit.source: Returns an integer containing either the number of characters in a string or the nominal number of bytes required to store a variable.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含在字串中的字元數或名義儲存變數所需的位元組數目的整數。

trans-unit.source: With user-defined types and `Object` variables, the `Len` function returns the size as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function.
trans-unit.target: 與使用者定義型別和`Object`變數`Len`函式傳回的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案`FilePut`函式。

trans-unit.source: If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the string.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回字串的長度。

trans-unit.source: If an `Object` contains any other type, it will return the size of the object as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Object`包含任何其他類型，它會傳回物件的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案`FilePut`函式。

trans-unit.source: The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in objects to indicate the size of the string, in bytes, when written to disk.
trans-unit.target: `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至物件，表示字串，以位元組為單位的大小，寫入時的 string 欄位至磁碟。

trans-unit.source: The `Len` function uses the `VBFixedString` attribute, if available, when determining the size of `Object` variables.
trans-unit.target: `Len`函式使用`VBFixedString`屬性，如果有的話，當決定的大小`Object`變數。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `Len` function may not be able to determine the actual number of storage bytes required when used with variable-length strings in user-defined data types.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`Len`函式可能無法判斷實際儲存可變長度的字串中的使用者定義資料型別搭配使用時所需的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `LenB` function in earlier versions of Visual Basic returns the number of bytes in a string rather than characters.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`LenB`函式在舊版的 Visual Basic 中為字串，而不是字元傳回的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications.
trans-unit.target: 它是主要用來轉換雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串。

trans-unit.source: All current Visual Basic strings are in Unicode, and `LenB` is no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: 所有目前的 Visual Basic 字串都位於 Unicode，和`LenB`不再支援。

trans-unit.source: Smart Device Developer Notes The `Len` function accepts only `String` and `Object` variables as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 智慧型裝置開發人員注意事項`Len`函式只接受`String`和`Object`做為參數的變數。

trans-unit.source: If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the `String`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回長度`String`。

trans-unit.source: If a parameter is a NULL `Object` reference, the function returns zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果參數是 NULL`Object`參考，此函數會傳回零。

trans-unit.source: If an `Object` contains any other type, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Object`包含任何其他型別，擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Any valid <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> expression or variable name.
trans-unit.target: 任何有效<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>運算式或變數名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns an integer containing either the number of characters in a string or the nominal number of bytes required to store a variable.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含在字串中的字元數或名義儲存變數所需的位元組數目的整數。

trans-unit.source: Returns an integer containing either the number of characters in a string or the nominal number of bytes required to store a variable.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含在字串中的字元數或名義儲存變數所需的位元組數目的整數。

trans-unit.source: With user-defined types and `Object` variables, the `Len` function returns the size as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function.
trans-unit.target: 與使用者定義型別和`Object`變數`Len`函式傳回的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案`FilePut`函式。

trans-unit.source: If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the string.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回字串的長度。

trans-unit.source: If an `Object` contains any other type, it will return the size of the object as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Object`包含任何其他類型，它會傳回物件的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案`FilePut`函式。

trans-unit.source: The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in objects to indicate the size of the string, in bytes, when written to disk.
trans-unit.target: `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至物件，表示字串，以位元組為單位的大小，寫入時的 string 欄位至磁碟。

trans-unit.source: The `Len` function uses the `VBFixedString` attribute, if available, when determining the size of `Object` variables.
trans-unit.target: `Len`函式使用`VBFixedString`屬性，如果有的話，當決定的大小`Object`變數。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `Len` function may not be able to determine the actual number of storage bytes required when used with variable-length strings in user-defined data types.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`Len`函式可能無法判斷實際儲存可變長度的字串中的使用者定義資料型別搭配使用時所需的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `LenB` function in earlier versions of Visual Basic returns the number of bytes in a string rather than characters.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`LenB`函式在舊版的 Visual Basic 中為字串，而不是字元傳回的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications.
trans-unit.target: 它是主要用來轉換雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串。

trans-unit.source: All current Visual Basic strings are in Unicode, and `LenB` is no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: 所有目前的 Visual Basic 字串都位於 Unicode，和`LenB`不再支援。

trans-unit.source: Smart Device Developer Notes The `Len` function accepts only `String` and `Object` variables as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 智慧型裝置開發人員注意事項`Len`函式只接受`String`和`Object`做為參數的變數。

trans-unit.source: If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the `String`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回長度`String`。

trans-unit.source: If a parameter is a NULL `Object` reference, the function returns zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果參數是 NULL`Object`參考，此函數會傳回零。

trans-unit.source: If an `Object` contains any other type, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Object`包含任何其他型別，擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Any valid <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> expression or variable name.
trans-unit.target: 任何有效<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>運算式或變數名稱。

trans-unit.source: If `Expression` is of type <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref>, the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Len" name="Len" href=""></xref> function returns the size as it will be written to the file by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_FilePut" name="FilePut" href=""></xref> function.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Expression`的型別<xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""> </xref>、 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Len" name="Len" href=""> </xref>函式傳回的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案<xref uid="langword_csharp_FilePut" name="FilePut" href=""></xref>函式。

trans-unit.target: 傳回包含在字串中的字元數或名義儲存變數所需的位元組數目的整數。

trans-unit.source: With user-defined types and `Object` variables, the `Len` function returns the size as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function.
trans-unit.target: 與使用者定義型別和`Object`變數`Len`函式傳回的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案`FilePut`函式。

trans-unit.source: If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the string.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回字串的長度。

trans-unit.source: If an `Object` contains any other type, it will return the size of the object as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Object`包含任何其他類型，它會傳回物件的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案`FilePut`函式。

trans-unit.source: The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in objects to indicate the size of the string, in bytes, when written to disk.
trans-unit.target: `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至物件，表示字串，以位元組為單位的大小，寫入時的 string 欄位至磁碟。

trans-unit.source: The `Len` function uses the `VBFixedString` attribute, if available, when determining the size of `Object` variables.
trans-unit.target: `Len`函式使用`VBFixedString`屬性，如果有的話，當決定的大小`Object`變數。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `Len` function may not be able to determine the actual number of storage bytes required when used with variable-length strings in user-defined data types.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`Len`函式可能無法判斷實際儲存可變長度的字串中的使用者定義資料型別搭配使用時所需的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `LenB` function in earlier versions of Visual Basic returns the number of bytes in a string rather than characters.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`LenB`函式在舊版的 Visual Basic 中為字串，而不是字元傳回的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications.
trans-unit.target: 它是主要用來轉換雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串。

trans-unit.source: All current Visual Basic strings are in Unicode, and `LenB` is no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: 所有目前的 Visual Basic 字串都位於 Unicode，和`LenB`不再支援。

trans-unit.source: Smart Device Developer Notes The `Len` function accepts only `String` and `Object` variables as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 智慧型裝置開發人員注意事項`Len`函式只接受`String`和`Object`做為參數的變數。

trans-unit.source: If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the `String`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回長度`String`。

trans-unit.source: If a parameter is a NULL `Object` reference, the function returns zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果參數是 NULL`Object`參考，此函數會傳回零。

trans-unit.source: If an `Object` contains any other type, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Object`包含任何其他型別，擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Any valid <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> expression or variable name.
trans-unit.target: 任何有效<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>運算式或變數名稱。

trans-unit.source: If `Expression` is of type <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref>, the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Len" name="Len" href=""></xref> function returns the size as it will be written to the file by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_FilePut" name="FilePut" href=""></xref> function.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Expression`的型別<xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""> </xref>、 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Len" name="Len" href=""> </xref>函式傳回的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案<xref uid="langword_csharp_FilePut" name="FilePut" href=""></xref>函式。

trans-unit.source: Returns an integer containing either the number of characters in a string or the nominal number of bytes required to store a variable.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含在字串中的字元數或名義儲存變數所需的位元組數目的整數。

trans-unit.source: Returns a left-aligned string containing the specified string adjusted to the specified length.
trans-unit.target: 傳回靠左對齊的字串，包含調整為指定之長度的指定的字串。

trans-unit.source: If the specified string is longer than the specified length, the returned string is shortened to the specified length.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的字串長度超過指定的長度，傳回的字串會縮短成指定的長度。

trans-unit.source: If the specified string is shorter than the specified length, spaces are added to the right end of the returned string to produce the appropriate length.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的字串長度小於指定的長度，以產生適當的長度傳回之字串的右邊加入空格。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>運算式。

trans-unit.target: 字串變數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>運算式。

trans-unit.source: Length of returned string.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串的長度。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing a copy of a specified string with no leading spaces (<xref uid="langword_csharp_LTrim" name="LTrim" href=""></xref>), no trailing spaces (<xref uid="langword_csharp_RTrim" name="RTrim" href=""></xref>), or no leading or trailing spaces (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Trim" name="Trim" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，包含前置空格的指定字串的複本 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_LTrim" name="LTrim" href=""></xref>)、 沒有尾端空白 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_RTrim" name="RTrim" href=""></xref>)，或任何開頭或尾端空格 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Trim" name="Trim" href=""></xref>)。

trans-unit.source: The `LTrim`, `RTrim`, and `Trim` functions remove spaces from the ends of strings.
trans-unit.target: `LTrim`， `RTrim`，和`Trim`函數從字串的結尾移除空格。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.target: 任何有效<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>運算式。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing a copy of a specified string with no leading spaces (<xref uid="langword_csharp_LTrim" name="LTrim" href=""></xref>), no trailing spaces (<xref uid="langword_csharp_RTrim" name="RTrim" href=""></xref>), or no leading or trailing spaces (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Trim" name="Trim" href=""></xref>).

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains all the characters starting from a specified position in a string.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，包含從字串中指定位置開始的所有字元。

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of characters in `str`, use the `Len` function.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷中的字元數`str`，使用`Len`函式。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic has a `Mid` function and a `Mid` statement.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 擁有`Mid`函式和`Mid`陳述式。

trans-unit.source: These elements both operate on a specified number of characters in a string, but the `Mid` function returns the characters while the `Mid` statement replaces the characters.
trans-unit.target: 兩者的指定數目的字元在字串中, 操作這些項目但`Mid`函式會傳回的字元時`Mid`陳述式會取代字元。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Mid Statement](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Mid 陳述式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `MidB` function in previous versions of Visual Basic returns a string in bytes rather than characters.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`MidB`函式在舊版的 Visual Basic 中的位元組，而不是字元傳回的字串。

trans-unit.source: It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications.
trans-unit.target: 它是主要用來轉換雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串。

trans-unit.source: All Visual Basic strings are in Unicode, and `MidB` is no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: 所有的 Visual Basic 字串都位於 Unicode，和`MidB`不再支援。

trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.target: `Start`是以一為基礎。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string in which a specified substring has been replaced with another substring a specified number of times.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串中指定的子字串已取代為另一個子字串指定的次數。

trans-unit.source: The return value of the `Replace` function is a string that begins at the position specified by `Start` and concludes at the end of the `Expression` string, with the substitutions made as specified by the `Find` and `Replace` values.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值`Replace`函式是一個字串，所指定的位置開始`Start`，並於結尾的結尾`Expression`所做的替代字串所指定`Find`和`Replace`值。

trans-unit.source: The `Compare` argument can have the following values.
trans-unit.target: `Compare`引數可以是下列值。

trans-unit.source: ||| |-|-| |Constant|Description| |`Binary`|Performs a binary comparison| |`Text`|Performs a textual comparison|
trans-unit.target: ||| |-|-| |常數 |描述 | |`Binary`|執行二進位比較 | |`Text`|執行文字比較 |

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.target: 含有子字串取代字串運算式。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: The return value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Replace" name="Replace" href=""></xref> is a string that begins at `Start`, with appropriate substitutions.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值<xref uid="langword_csharp_Replace" name="Replace" href=""></xref>是一個字串，起點`Start`，替代為適當的。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, 1 is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，則假設為 1。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: Number of substring substitutions to perform.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行的子字串取代的數目。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, the default value is –1, which means "make all possible substitutions."

trans-unit.source: Returns a right-aligned string containing the specified string adjusted to the specified length.
trans-unit.target: 傳回靠右對齊的字串，包含調整為指定之長度的指定的字串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing a copy of a specified string with no leading spaces (<xref uid="langword_csharp_LTrim" name="LTrim" href=""></xref>), no trailing spaces (<xref uid="langword_csharp_RTrim" name="RTrim" href=""></xref>), or no leading or trailing spaces (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Trim" name="Trim" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，包含前置空格的指定字串的複本 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_LTrim" name="LTrim" href=""></xref>)、 沒有尾端空白 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_RTrim" name="RTrim" href=""></xref>)，或任何開頭或尾端空格 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Trim" name="Trim" href=""></xref>)。

trans-unit.source: The `LTrim`, `RTrim`, and `Trim` functions remove spaces from the ends of strings.
trans-unit.target: `LTrim`， `RTrim`，和`Trim`函數從字串的結尾移除空格。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: Any valid <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> expression.
trans-unit.target: 任何有效<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>運算式。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing a copy of a specified string with no leading spaces (<xref uid="langword_csharp_LTrim" name="LTrim" href=""></xref>), no trailing spaces (<xref uid="langword_csharp_RTrim" name="RTrim" href=""></xref>), or no leading or trailing spaces (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Trim" name="Trim" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，包含前置空格的指定字串的複本 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_LTrim" name="LTrim" href=""></xref>)、 沒有尾端空白 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_RTrim" name="RTrim" href=""></xref>)，或任何開頭或尾端空格 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Trim" name="Trim" href=""></xref>)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string consisting of the specified number of spaces.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，其中包含指定的空格數目。

trans-unit.source: The `Space` function is useful for formatting output and clearing data in fixed-length strings.
trans-unit.target: `Space`函式可用於格式化輸出及清除固定長度字串中的資料。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> expression.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>運算式。

trans-unit.source: The number of spaces you want in the string.
trans-unit.target: 您想要在字串中的空格數目。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string consisting of the specified number of spaces.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，其中包含指定的空格數目。

trans-unit.source: Number < 0.
trans-unit.target: Number < 0.

trans-unit.source: Returns a zero-based, one-dimensional array containing a specified number of substrings.
trans-unit.target: 傳回以零為起始的一維陣列，包含指定的數目的子字串。

trans-unit.source: By default, or when `Limit` equals -1, the `Split` function splits the input string at every occurrence of the delimiter string, and returns the substrings in an array.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，或當`Limit`等於-1，`Split`函式上分割輸入的字串，在每次出現的分隔符號字串，並傳回陣列中的子字串。

trans-unit.source: When the `Limit` parameter is greater than zero, the `Split` function splits the string at the first `Limit`-1 occurrences of the delimiter, and returns an array with the resulting substrings.
trans-unit.target: 當`Limit`參數大於零，`Split`函式會分割此字串在第一個`Limit`-1 出現的分隔符號，並傳回產生的子字串陣列。

trans-unit.source: For example, `Split("a:b:c", ":")` returns the array `{"a", "b", "c"}`, while `Split("a:b:c", ":", 2)` returns the array `{"a", "b:c"}`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`Split("a:b:c", ":")`傳回陣列`{"a", "b", "c"}`，雖然`Split("a:b:c", ":", 2)`傳回陣列`{"a", "b:c"}`。

trans-unit.source: When the `Split` function encounters two delimiters in a row, or a delimiter at the beginning or end of the string, it interprets them as surrounding an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 當`Split`函式發生兩個分隔符號中的資料列或分隔符號的開頭或結尾的字串，它會將它們解譯為周圍的空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: For example, `Split("xx", "x")` returns the array containing three empty strings: one from between the beginning of the string and the first "x", one from between the two "x" strings, and one from between the last "x" and the end of the string.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`Split("xx", "x")`傳回陣列，包含三個空白的字串︰ 一個介於開頭的字串和第一個"x"，其中兩個"x"字串，頭尾包括在內，另一個頭尾包括在內的最後一個"x"和字串的結尾。

trans-unit.source: This table demonstrates how the optional `Delimiter`, `Limit`, and `Compare` parameters can change the behavior of the `Split` function.
trans-unit.target: 此資料表會示範如何選擇性`Delimiter`， `Limit`，和`Compare`參數可以變更的行為`Split`函式。

trans-unit.source: ||| |-|-| |Split Call|Return Value| |`Split("42, 12, 19")`|{"42," , "12," , "19"}| |`Split("42, 12, 19", ", ")`|{"42", "12", "19"}| |`Split("42, 12, 19", ", ", 2)`|{"42", "12, 19"}| |`Split("192.168.0.1", ".")`|{"192", "168", "0", "1"}| |`Split("Alice and Bob", " AND ")`|{"Alice and Bob"}| |`Split("Alice and Bob", " AND ", ,CompareMethod.Text)`|{"Alice", "Bob"}| |`Split("someone@example.com", "@",1)`|{"someone@example.com"}| |`Split("someone@example.com", "@",2)`|{"someone", "example.com"}| The `Compare` argument can have the following values.
trans-unit.target: ||| |-|-| |分割呼叫 |傳回值 | |`Split("42, 12, 19")`|{"42"、"12，"、"19"} | |`Split("42, 12, 19", ", ")`|{"42"、"12"、"19"} | |`Split("42, 12, 19", ", ", 2)`|{"42"、"12，19"} | |`Split("192.168.0.1", ".")`|{"192"、"168"、"0"、"1"} | |`Split("Alice and Bob", " AND ")`|{"Alice 和 Bob"} | |`Split("Alice and Bob", " AND ", ,CompareMethod.Text)`|{"Alice"，"Bob"} | |`Split("someone@example.com", "@",1)`|{"someone@example.com"}| |`Split("someone@example.com", "@",2)`|{"someone"，"example.com"}| `Compare`引數可以是下列值。

trans-unit.source: |||| |-|-|-| |Constant|Description|Value| |`CompareMethod.Binary`|Performs a binary comparison|0| |`CompareMethod.Text`|Performs a textual comparison|1|
trans-unit.target: |||| |-|-|-| |常數 |描述 |值 | |`CompareMethod.Binary`|執行二進位比較 |&0; | |`CompareMethod.Text`|執行文字比較 |&1; |

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> expression containing substrings and delimiters.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>運算式，包含子字串和分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: Any single character used to identify substring limits.
trans-unit.target: 用來識別子字串限制任何單一字元。

trans-unit.source: If `Delimiter` is omitted, the space character (" ") is assumed to be the delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Delimiter`省略，則空格字元 ("") 會假設為分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of substrings into which the input string should be split.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的字串分割到其中的子字串的最大數目。

trans-unit.source: The default, –1, indicates that the input string should be split at every occurrence of the `Delimiter` string.
trans-unit.target: –&1;，預設值，指出，在每次出現的分割輸入的字串`Delimiter`字串。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: Numeric value indicating the comparison to use when evaluating substrings.
trans-unit.target: 數值，表示要用於評估的比較子字串。

trans-unit.source: See "Settings" for values.
trans-unit.target: 值，請參閱 < 設定 >。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> array.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>陣列。

trans-unit.source: If Expression is a zero-length string (""), returns a single-element array containing a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Expression 為零長度字串 ("")， 傳回單一項目陣列，包含零長度字串。

trans-unit.source: If Delimiter is a zero-length string, or if it does not appear anywhere in Expression, returns a single-element array containing the entire Expression string.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Delimiter 為零長度字串，或如果沒有出現任何位置中 Expression ， 傳回單一項目陣列，包含整個 Expression 字串。

trans-unit.source: Returns -1, 0, or 1, based on the result of a string comparison.
trans-unit.target: 會傳回-1、 0 或 1 會根據字串比較的結果。

trans-unit.source: The strings are compared by alphanumeric sort values beginning with the first character.
trans-unit.target: 比較字串的開頭為第一個字元的英數字元的排序值。

trans-unit.source: For further information on binary comparisons, textual comparisons, and sort order, see [Option Compare Statement](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如進一步二進位比較、 文字的比較和排序順序的詳細資訊，請參閱[選項比較陳述式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The `Compare` argument settings are: ||| |-|-| |Constant|Description| |`Binary`|Performs a binary comparison, based on a sort order derived from the internal binary representations of the characters.| |`Text`|Performs a text comparison, based on a case-insensitive text sort order determined by your system's `LocaleID` value.|
trans-unit.target: `Compare`引數設定不: | | | |-|-| |常數 |描述 | |`Binary`|執行二進位比較，並根據衍生自內部的二進位表示法的字元的排序次序。 | |`Text`|文字根據執行比較，取決於您的系統的不區分大小寫文字排序順序`LocaleID`值。 |

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: Any valid <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> expression.
trans-unit.target: 任何有效<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>運算式。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string converted as specified.
trans-unit.target: 傳回轉換成指定的字串。

trans-unit.source: The constants `VbStrConv.Wide`, `VbStrConv.Narrow`, `VbStrConv.SimplifiedChinese`, `VbStrConv.TraditionalChinese`, `VbStrConv.Katakana`, and `VbStrConv.Hiragana` can cause run-time errors when used in locales where they do not apply, but not always: the constants `VbStrConv.Katakana` and `VbStrConv.Hiragana` can be used in a non-Japanese system with the Japanese Language Pack installed.
trans-unit.target: 常數`VbStrConv.Wide`， `VbStrConv.Narrow`， `VbStrConv.SimplifiedChinese`， `VbStrConv.TraditionalChinese`， `VbStrConv.Katakana`，和`VbStrConv.Hiragana`可能會導致執行階段錯誤時，它們不會套用，地區設定中使用，但不是一定︰ 常數`VbStrConv.Katakana`和`VbStrConv.Hiragana`可以用於非日文系統與日文語言套件安裝。

trans-unit.source: In addition, use of the constants `VbStrConv.Wide` and `VbStrConv.Narrow` is supported on any system with an East Asian language installed.
trans-unit.target: 此外，使用常數的`VbStrConv.Wide`和`VbStrConv.Narrow`任何系統上安裝為東亞語言支援。

trans-unit.source: This function uses the application's culture information when manipulating the string so that the case changes are appropriate for the locale in which the application is being used.
trans-unit.target: 管理字串，以便適當地區設定中使用應用程式的大小寫的變更時，此函數會使用應用程式的文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If your application makes security decisions based on the result of a comparison or case-change operation, then the operation should use the <xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, and pass <xref:System.StringComparison> or <xref:System.StringComparison> for the `comparisonType` argument.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您的應用程式進行比較或大小寫變更作業的結果為基礎的安全性決策，則此作業，應該使用<xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，然後傳遞<xref:System.StringComparison>或<xref:System.StringComparison>如`comparisonType`引數。</xref:System.StringComparison> </xref:System.StringComparison> </xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How Culture Affects Strings in Visual Basic](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何文化特性會影響字串在 Visual Basic 中](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The `Conversion` argument settings are: ||| |-|-| |Enumeration member|Description| |`VbStrConv.None`|Performs no conversion| |`VbStrConv.LinguisticCasing`|Uses linguistic rules for casing, rather than File System (default).
trans-unit.target: `Conversion`引數設定不: | | | |-|-| |列舉型別成員 |描述 | |`VbStrConv.None`|會執行任何轉換 | |`VbStrConv.LinguisticCasing`|使用語言規則來轉換，而非檔案系統 （預設值）。

trans-unit.source: Valid with `VbStrConv.UpperCase` and `VbStrConv.LowerCase` only.| |`VbStrConv.UpperCase`|Converts the string to uppercase characters.| |`VbStrConv.LowerCase`|Converts the string to lowercase characters.| |`VbStrConv.ProperCase`|Converts the first letter of every word in string to uppercase.| |`VbStrConv.Wide` <sup>*</sup>|Converts narrow (half-width) characters in the string to wide (full-width) characters.| |`VbStrConv.Narrow` <sup>*</sup>|Converts wide (full-width) characters in the string to narrow (half-width) characters.| |`VbStrConv.Katakana` <sup>**</sup>|Converts Hiragana characters in the string to Katakana characters.| |`VbStrConv.Hiragana` <sup>**</sup>|Converts Katakana characters in the string to Hiragana characters.| |`VbStrConv.SimplifiedChinese` <sup>*</sup>|Converts Traditional Chinese characters to Simplified Chinese.| |`VbStrConv.TraditionalChinese` <sup>*</sup>|Converts Simplified Chinese characters to Traditional Chinese.| <sup>*</sup> Applies to Asian locales. <sup>**</sup> Applies to Japan only.
trans-unit.target: 適用於`VbStrConv.UpperCase`和`VbStrConv.LowerCase`只。 | |`VbStrConv.UpperCase`|將字串轉換成大寫字元。 | |`VbStrConv.LowerCase`|將字串轉換成小寫字元。 | |`VbStrConv.ProperCase`|將字串中的每個字的第一個字母轉換成大寫。 | |`VbStrConv.Wide` <sup>*</sup>|將窄 （半形） 字元 （全形） 的寬字元字串中。 | |`VbStrConv.Narrow` <sup>*</sup>|將寬 （全形） 字元 （半形） 字元在字串中的轉換。 | |`VbStrConv.Katakana` <sup>**</sup>|將平假名字元在字串中的轉換為片假名字元。 | |`VbStrConv.Hiragana` <sup>**</sup>|將字串中的片假名字元轉換為平假名字元。 | |`VbStrConv.SimplifiedChinese` <sup>*</sup>|將繁體中文字元轉換為簡體中文。 | |`VbStrConv.TraditionalChinese` <sup>*</sup>|將簡體中文字元轉換為繁體中文。 | <sup> * </sup>適用於亞洲地區設定。 <sup>**</sup>僅適用於 （日文）。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > These constants are specified in the .NET Framework common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這些常數會指定.NET Framework common language runtime 中。

trans-unit.source: As a result, they can be used anywhere in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，它們可以用於任何位置的實際值取代程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: Most can be combined (for example, `UpperCase + Wide`), except when they are mutually exclusive (for example, `VbStrConv.Wide + VbStrConv.Narrow`).
trans-unit.target: 大部分可以結合 (比方說， `UpperCase + Wide`)，除非它們是互為獨佔模式 (例如， `VbStrConv.Wide + VbStrConv.Narrow`)。

trans-unit.source: The following are valid word separators for proper casing: Null (`Chr$(0)`), horizontal tab (`Chr$(9)`), line feed (`Chr$(10)`), vertical tab (`Chr$(11)`), form feed (`Chr$(12)`), carriage return (`Chr$(13)`), space (single-byte character set) (`Chr$(32)`).
trans-unit.target: 以下是有效的文字分隔字元的適當的大小寫︰ Null (`Chr$(0)`)，水平定位字元 (`Chr$(9)`)，換行字元 (`Chr$(10)`)，垂直索引標籤 (`Chr$(11)`)，換頁字元 (`Chr$(12)`)，歸位字元 (`Chr$(13)`)，（單一位元組字元集） 的空間 (`Chr$(32)`)。

trans-unit.source: The actual value for a space, which can be full or half width, varies by country/region for East Asian cultures.
trans-unit.target: 可以是全形或半形，空間的實際值會依國家/地區為東亞語言的文化特性而異。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: This function returns a `String` made up of repeated characters.
trans-unit.target: 此函數會傳回`String`重複的字元所組成。

trans-unit.source: The character that makes up the string is the first character in the `Character` argument, and it is duplicated `Number` number of times.
trans-unit.target: 構成的字串的字元是中的第一個字元`Character`引數，以及它重複`Number`的次數。

trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.target: 要傳回字串的長度。

trans-unit.source: Only the first character of the expression will be used.

trans-unit.source: This function returns a `String` made up of repeated characters.
trans-unit.target: 此函數會傳回`String`重複的字元所組成。

trans-unit.source: The character that makes up the string is the first character in the `Character` argument, and it is duplicated `Number` number of times.
trans-unit.target: 構成的字串的字元是中的第一個字元`Character`引數，以及它重複`Number`的次數。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string in which the character order of a specified string is reversed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之字串的字元順序會顛倒的字串。

trans-unit.source: The `StrReverse` function returns a string that contains the same characters as `Expression`, but in the opposite order.
trans-unit.target: `StrReverse`函式會傳回字串，包含相同的字元視為`Expression`，但相反的順序。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: String expression whose characters are to be reversed.
trans-unit.target: 反向字元的字串運算式。

trans-unit.source: If `Expression` is a zero-length string (""), a zero-length string is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Expression`為零長度字串 ("")，就會傳回零長度字串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string in which the character order of a specified string is reversed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之字串的字元順序會顛倒的字串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing a copy of a specified string with no leading spaces (<xref uid="langword_csharp_LTrim" name="LTrim" href=""></xref>), no trailing spaces (<xref uid="langword_csharp_RTrim" name="RTrim" href=""></xref>), or no leading or trailing spaces (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Trim" name="Trim" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，包含前置空格的指定字串的複本 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_LTrim" name="LTrim" href=""></xref>)、 沒有尾端空白 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_RTrim" name="RTrim" href=""></xref>)，或任何開頭或尾端空格 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Trim" name="Trim" href=""></xref>)。

trans-unit.source: The `LTrim`, `RTrim`, and `Trim` functions remove spaces from the ends of strings.
trans-unit.target: `LTrim`， `RTrim`，和`Trim`函數從字串的結尾移除空格。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: Any valid <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> expression.
trans-unit.target: 任何有效<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>運算式。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing a copy of a specified string with no leading spaces (<xref uid="langword_csharp_LTrim" name="LTrim" href=""></xref>), no trailing spaces (<xref uid="langword_csharp_RTrim" name="RTrim" href=""></xref>), or no leading or trailing spaces (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Trim" name="Trim" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，包含前置空格的指定字串的複本 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_LTrim" name="LTrim" href=""></xref>)、 沒有尾端空白 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_RTrim" name="RTrim" href=""></xref>)，或任何開頭或尾端空格 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Trim" name="Trim" href=""></xref>)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string or character containing the specified string converted to uppercase.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串或包含指定的字串轉換成大寫的字元。

trans-unit.source: Only lowercase letters are converted to uppercase; all uppercase letters and nonletter characters remain unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 小寫字母會轉換成大寫。所有的大寫字母和 nonletter 字元保持不變。

trans-unit.source: This function uses the application's culture information when manipulating the string so that the case changes are appropriate for the locale in which the application is being used.
trans-unit.target: 管理字串，以便適當地區設定中使用應用程式的大小寫的變更時，此函數會使用應用程式的文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If your application makes security decisions based on the result of a comparison or case-change operation, then the operation should use the <xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, and pass <xref:System.StringComparison> or <xref:System.StringComparison> for the `comparisonType` argument.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您的應用程式進行比較或大小寫變更作業的結果為基礎的安全性決策，則此作業，應該使用<xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，然後傳遞<xref:System.StringComparison>或<xref:System.StringComparison>如`comparisonType`引數。</xref:System.StringComparison> </xref:System.StringComparison> </xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How Culture Affects Strings in Visual Basic](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何文化特性會影響字串在 Visual Basic 中](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: Any valid <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Char" name="Char" href=""></xref> expression.
trans-unit.target: 任何有效<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_Char" name="Char" href=""></xref>運算式。
